data.message: Good Morning, if anyone has a spare minute today it would be wonderful if you would check out a fabulous non profit organisation here in Bristol. We are fundraising to enable us to grow.  The work we do with live music has an impact on peoples lives who suffer with mental and physical illness. If everyone donated just £1 we would be able to deliver amazing and often life changing experiences.  Thank you so much for taking a minute to read. https://chuffed.org/project/given-to-live

replies.message: Thanks for the like!! Please may you share? We are still only a third of our target! So many kids with mental health issues really benefit from the experiences that we give them. Often these have long term confidence and self assurance benefits too. BIG THANKYOOOOOO
